title: My 1RP SHORT story
body:
Today was the day i had the greatest loss of my life, 
I mystery gifted my friend and he got a legendary skin for cho....
I decided hey i deserve something  and went to the sales pages but to my demise I was 1 RP short for getting Blight Crystal Varus
Riot I offer my bloodline which can be traced back to ancient Korea and then through the family tree's I am Fakers long lost extended uncle's room mates vet's love affairs, bastard offsprings, owners sisters best friend arch enemies mothers brother chat roulette significant  other 
So please riot take this offer I don't want to go outside where the sun hurts my skin, face....not the face to get more RP
plz give me this 1RP 

So please people who read this, spread the word, don't be that one friend who has to use the poor mans pulse fire ezreal skin 

1 comment 
is one more person getting out of bronze V

Praise to Pepe
and his right hand Kappa
and his Left hand Lord Helix
